feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 a.m. ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 6:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: ESE 42 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6 except plus 2 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands early this morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this morning. High 6 except plus 2 over the Highlands. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
